caption:
This photograph depicts two young girls dressed in white ceremonial wear, likely celebrating a religious event such as their First Communion. Both are wearing white dresses and veils adorned with lace and floral headpieces. The girl on the left is smiling broadly, her eyes squinted in a joyful expression, and her veil is draped partially over her face, adding an airy, delicate feel to her appearance. The girl on the right has a gentle smile and her hand near her mouth, which gives her a slightly shy or contemplative demeanor. Her veil flows elegantly down her shoulders.

The background, while not in sharp focus, appears to be an outdoor setting with bright sunlight, evidenced by the well-lit faces of the girls and the shadows around them. Trees and foliage are discernible, suggesting a garden or a similarly verdant location. The overall mood conveyed by the image is one of innocence, celebration, and joy, captured in a natural, outdoor setting during a significant moment in the girlsâ€™ lives.
title: Sunday morning. (From the SITES exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 87, 88, 106, 107, 108, 109, 110, 111.)
